name: BoxC Logistics, Inc.
description: Developer of an e-commerce logistics management platform designed to eliminate the limitations of standard shipping and logistics solutions. The company's platform leverages the existing and underutilized infrastructure and provides all the tools for international e-commerce logistics management in a single platform, enabling logistics companies and e-commerce retailers to build their own international shipping solutions.
one_liner: Developer of an e-commerce logistics management platform designed to eliminate the limitations of standard shipping and logistics solutions. The company's platform leverages the existing and underutilized infrastructure and provides all the tools for international e-commerce logistics management in a single platform, enabling logistics companies and e-commerce retailers to build their own international shipping solutions.
